Function Documentation

int OriginCmd ( ClientData  clientdata,
Tcl_Interp *  interp,
int  objc,
Tcl_Obj *CONST  objv[] 
)

Handler procedure for the tpk::origin command.

The origin command creates and manipulates pointing origins and takes the following forms:

  • origin create <x> <y> ?name?
  • origin delete <name>
  • origin set <telescope> <name>
